library(tidyverse)



write_matex <- function(x) {
  begin <- "$$\\begin{bmatrix}"
  end <- "\\end{bmatrix}$$"
  X <-
    apply(x, 1, function(x) {
      paste(
        paste(x, collapse = "&"),
        "\\\\"
      )
    })
  writeLines(c(begin, X, end))
}
theme_set(
  theme_bw()+

    axis.title.y = element_text(size = 12),
    axis.text = element_text(size = 10),
    axis.line = element_line(color = "black", size = 0.5),
  )
)
